00015 TTParameter::TTParameter(const TTSymbol& newName, TTDataType newType, void* newAddress)
00016 {
00017         name = &newName;
00018         type = newType;
00019         address = newAddress;
00020         getter = (TTGetterMethod)&TTParameter::defaultGetter;
00021         setter = (TTSetterMethod)&TTParameter::defaultSetter;
00022 }
00023

00027         type = newType;
00028         address = newAddress;
00029         getter = newGetter;
00030         setter = (TTSetterMethod)&TTParameter::defaultSetter;
00031 }

00047         getter = newGetter;
00048         setter = newSetter;

00057 
00058 TTErr TTParameter::defaultGetter(TTValue& value, const TTParameter& parameter)
00059 {
00060         switch(parameter.type){
00061                 case kTypeFloat32:
00062                         value = *((TTFloat32*)parameter.address);
00063                         return kTTErrNone;
00064                 case kTypeFloat64:
00065                         value = *((TTFloat64*)parameter.address);
00066                         return kTTErrNone;
00067                 case kTypeInt8:
00068                         value = *((TTInt8*)parameter.address);
00069                         return kTTErrNone;
00070                 case kTypeUInt8:
00071                         value = *((TTUInt8*)parameter.address);
00072                         return kTTErrNone;
00073                 case kTypeInt16:
00074                         value = *((TTInt16*)parameter.address);
00075                         return kTTErrNone;
00076                 case kTypeUInt16:
00077                         value = *((TTUInt16*)parameter.address);
00078                         return kTTErrNone;
00079                 case kTypeInt32:
00080                         value = *((TTInt32*)parameter.address);
00081                         return kTTErrNone;
00082                 case kTypeUInt32:
00083                         value = *((TTUInt32*)parameter.address);
00084                         return kTTErrNone;
00085                 case kTypeInt64:
00086                         value = *((TTInt64*)parameter.address);
00087                         return kTTErrNone;
00088                 case kTypeUInt64:
00089                         value = *((TTUInt64*)parameter.address);
00090                         return kTTErrNone;
00091                 case kTypeBoolean:
00092                         value = *((TTBoolean*)parameter.address);
00093                         return kTTErrNone;
00094                 case kTypeSymbol:
00095                         value = *((TTSymbol*)parameter.address);
00096                         return kTTErrNone;
00097                 case kTypeObject:
00098                         value = *((TTObject*)parameter.address);
00099                         return kTTErrNone;
00100                 case kTypeNone:
00101                         return kTTErrNone;
00102         }
00103         return kTTErrInvalidType;
00104 }
00105 
00106 
00107 TTErr TTParameter::defaultSetter(const TTValue& value, const TTParameter& parameter)
00108 {
00109         switch(parameter.type){
00110                 case kTypeFloat32:
00111                         *((TTFloat32*)parameter.address) = value;
00112                         return kTTErrNone;
00113                 case kTypeFloat64:
00114                         *((TTFloat64*)parameter.address) = value;
00115                         return kTTErrNone;
00116                 case kTypeInt8:
00117                         *((TTInt8*)parameter.address) = value;
00118                         return kTTErrNone;
00119                 case kTypeUInt8:
00120                         *((TTUInt8*)parameter.address) = value;
00121                         return kTTErrNone;
00122                 case kTypeInt16:
00123                         *((TTInt16*)parameter.address) = value;
00124                         return kTTErrNone;
00125                 case kTypeUInt16:
00126                         *((TTUInt16*)parameter.address) = value;
00127                         return kTTErrNone;
00128                 case kTypeInt32:
00129                         *((TTInt32*)parameter.address) = value;
00130                         return kTTErrNone;
00131                 case kTypeUInt32:
00132                         *((TTUInt32*)parameter.address) = value;
00133                         return kTTErrNone;
00134                 case kTypeInt64:
00135                         *((TTInt64*)parameter.address) = value;
00136                         return kTTErrNone;
00137                 case kTypeUInt64:
00138                         *((TTUInt64*)parameter.address) = value;
00139                         return kTTErrNone;
00140                 case kTypeBoolean:
00141                         *((TTBoolean*)parameter.address) = value;
00142                         return kTTErrNone;
00143                 case kTypeSymbol:
00144                         *((TTSymbol*)parameter.address) = value;
00145                         return kTTErrNone;
00146                 case kTypeObject:
00147                         *((TTObject*)parameter.address) = value;
00148                         return kTTErrNone;
00149                 case kTypeNone:
00150                         return kTTErrNone;
00151         }
00152         return kTTErrInvalidType;
00153 }

00158 TTObject::TTObject()
00159 {
00160         messageCount = 0;
00161         parameterCount = 0;
00162 }
00163 
00164 
00165 TTObject::~TTObject()
00166 {
00167         TTUInt16        i;
00168 
00169         for(i=0; i<parameterCount; i++)
00170                 delete parameterObjects[i];
00171 }

00174 #pragma mark -
00175 #pragma mark Object Parameters
00176         
00177 TTErr TTObject::registerParameter(const TTSymbol& name, TTDataType type, void* address)
00178 {
00179         parameterNames[parameterCount] = &name;
00180         parameterObjects[parameterCount] = new TTParameter(name, type, address);
00181         parameterCount++;
00182         return kTTErrNone;
00183 }
00184 
00185 TTErr TTObject::registerParameter(const TTSymbol& name, TTDataType type, void* address, TTGetterMethod getter)
00186 {
00187         parameterNames[parameterCount] = &name;
00188         parameterObjects[parameterCount] = new TTParameter(name, type, address, getter);
00189         parameterCount++;
00190         return kTTErrNone;
00191 }

00193 TTErr TTObject::registerParameter(const TTSymbol& name, TTDataType type, void* address, TTSetterMethod setter)
00194 {
00195         parameterNames[parameterCount] = &name;
00196         parameterObjects[parameterCount] = new TTParameter(name, type, address, setter);
00197         parameterCount++;
00198         return kTTErrNone;

00201 TTErr TTObject::registerParameter(const TTSymbol& name, TTDataType type, void* address, TTGetterMethod getter, TTSetterMethod setter)
00202 {
00203         parameterNames[parameterCount] = &name;
00204         parameterObjects[parameterCount] = new TTParameter(name, type, address, getter, setter);
00205         parameterCount++;
00206         return kTTErrNone;
00207 }

00209 
00210 TTErr TTObject::getParameterValue(const TTSymbol& name, TTValue& value)
00211 {
00212         TTUInt8         i;
00213         TTParameter     *parameter;
00214         
00215         for(i=0; i<parameterCount; i++){
00216                 if(*parameterNames[i] == name){
00217                         parameter = parameterObjects[i];
00218                         return (this->*parameter->getter)(value, *parameter);
00219                 }
00220         }
00221         return kTTErrInvalidParameter;
00222 }
00223 
00224 TTErr TTObject::setParameterValue(const TTSymbol& name, const TTValue& value)
00225 {
00226         TTUInt8         i;
00227         TTParameter     *parameter;
00228         
00229         for(i=0; i<parameterCount; i++){
00230                 if(*parameterNames[i] == name){
00231                         parameter = parameterObjects[i];
00232                         return (this->*parameter->setter)(value, *parameter);
00233                 }
00234         }
00235         return kTTErrInvalidParameter;
00236 }

00239 TTErr TTObject::getParameterValue(const TTSymbol& name, TTFloat32& value)
00240 {
00241         TTValue v;
00242         TTErr   err;
00243         
00244         err = getParameterValue(name, v);
00245         value = v;
00246         return err;
00247 }
00248 
00249 TTErr TTObject::setParameterValue(const TTSymbol& name, const TTFloat32& value)
00250 {
00251         TTValue v(value);
00252         return setParameterValue(name, v);
00253 }

00450 #pragma mark -
00451 #pragma mark Object Messages
00452         
00453 TTErr TTObject::registerMessage(const TTSymbol& name, TTMethod message)
00454 {
00455         messageNames[messageCount] = &name;
00456         messageTargets[messageCount] = message;
00457         messageCount++;
00458         return kTTErrNone;
00459 }
00460 
00461 
00462 TTErr TTObject::sendMessage(const TTSymbol& name)
00463 {
00464         TTUInt8 i;
00465         TTValue foo;
00466         
00467         for(i=0; i<messageCount; i++){
00468                 if(*messageNames[i] == name){
00469                         (this->*messageTargets[i])(foo, name);
00470                         return kTTErrNone;
00471                 }
00472         }
00473         return kTTErrMethodNotFound;
00474 }
00475 
00476 
00477 TTErr TTObject::sendMessage(const TTSymbol& name, TTValue& value)
00478 {
00479         TTUInt8 i;
00480         
00481         for(i=0; i<messageCount; i++){
00482                 if(*messageNames[i] == name){
00483                         (this->*messageTargets[i])(value, name);
00484                         break;
00485                 }
00486         }
00487         return kTTErrNone;
00488 }
